EnhancedContent: So I'm trying to get my Start to show more App icons and NOT show "Reccommended." I have all those options off and the Start set to "More Pins." Still, I only get 3 rows of app pins and Recommended still shows. How do I fix this?
Author: MaxGarcia
Title: Start Menu! ArrrrG!
Description:
So I'm trying to get my Start to show more App icons and NOT show "Reccommended." I have all those options off and the Start set to "More Pins." Still, I only get 3 rows of app pins and Recommended still shows. How do I fix this?

![]()
